metadata.title: CVE-2023-5685 on Ubuntu 24.10 (oracular) - medium
metadata.description: A flaw was found in XNIO. The XNIO NotifierState that can cause a StackOverflow Exception when the chain of notifier states becomesproblematically large can lead to uncontrolled resource management and apossible denial of service (DoS).

criterions.comment: jboss-xnio package in oracular is affected and may need fixing.
